title: Patch Notes
content: will no longer require a Channel Divinity point. Improved monks' Deflect Missiles by helping the projectiles avoid obstacles on their way back to the target. Monks' Clench of the North Wind spell now targets up to 2 characters at Level 9. They just have to clench a little harder. Enemy NPCs can no longer use Dash again while the effect of a first Dash is active. The Saving Throw for the Dire Raven Companion's Bad Omen action is now a Wisdom Saving Throw and scales with the raven's level. Fungal
